{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:57.539
    | text      = This is about Reverend Manning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:59.439
    | text      = On the coldest Valentine's Day weekend in Harlem since 1916, Pastor James David Manning
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:04.380
    | text      = had the fires of hell on his mind.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:06.720
    | text      = In less than two weeks, his church was due to be foreclosed upon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:09.979
    | text      = Quote, this is a sodomite government land grab, he told his congregants.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:14.300
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:15.300
    | text      = Outside a sign advertising the church, a four story brick and terracotta building on the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:19.939
    | text      = corner of West 123rd Street and Lenox Avenue reads, Jesus would endorse Donald Trump.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:26.819
    | text      = As the chief pastor of Outlaw World Wide Ministry since 1981, Manning is infamous for preaching
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:31.920
    | text      = homophobia and vulgar conspiracy theories.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:34.859
    | text      = Not just from his pulpit in Harlem, live streamed twice each Saturday on YouTube, but also his
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:40.140
    | text      = daily internet program, The Manning Report.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:43.260
    | text      = Before the recent foreclosure controversy, Outlaw Church was probably best known for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:47.699
    | text      = hosting a mock trial of Barack Obama in which the president was convicted in absentia on
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:53.340
    | text      = 17 counts, including treason, fraud, and sedition.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:55.859
    | text      = They dropped those counts!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:57.340
    | text      = Apparently they said that would bring them back.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:59.340
    | text      = They redid them?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:00.340

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:01.340
    | text      = I'm telling you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:02.340
    | text      = It's possible that this reporting is a little off, because as...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:04.300
    | text      = When that goes to the appeals court, they are going to throw those out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:07.220
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:08.220
    | text      = Today's sermon had begun benignly enough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:10.819
    | text      = We thank God for making it back from the ski trip safe and sound, he said to about 70 worshipers,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:15.779
    | text      = nearly all of them black women, many of them with young children.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:18.939
    | text      = His own wife was seated behind him at the altar.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:21.779
    | text      = Soon though, Manning had to address the elephant in the room.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:24.779
    | text      = Last month, a state judge ordered the building into foreclosure, citing $1.02 million in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = unpaid taxes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:31.699
    | text      = An auction is scheduled to take place on February 24th, and in the stroke of divine irony, two
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:37.260
    | text      = LGBT service organizations have launched fundraising campaigns to buy the property.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:41.500
    | text      = Oh, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:42.500
    | text      = The day of reckoning was getting closer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:45.180
    | text      = Manning says he believed the court order is invalid on legal grounds, because he has a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:48.899
    | text      = law degree from his own school.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:50.500
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:51.500
    | text      = Manning says it has to do with water and sewage taxes that should fall under religious exemption
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:55.180
    | text      = rules.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:56.180
    | text      = But, according to public records obtained by the website DNAinfo, there are at least
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:02.020
    | text      = nine federal tax liens standing against the church, among other debts, despite $186,000
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:08.220
    | text      = in tax exemption benefits already granted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:11.579
    | text      = Manning said he believes the case to be political retribution for his attacks on Obama, who
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:15.460
    | text      = he believes is a Taliban-trained terrorist who killed his own grandmother.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:19.899
    | text      = Quote, they wished to shut me up, cease my ability to amass power and influence, he said
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:24.619
    | text      = in his sermon, but he pledged to fight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:26.960
    | text      = I will continue to pursue Obama until he's in prison, and I believe God has given me
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:31.000
    | text      = the power to do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:32.779
    | text      = Then, Manning apologized to the congregation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:35.260
    | text      = He had been deficient before, he said, in describing President Obama's late mother,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:39.420

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:40.939
    | text      = Quote, not only was she a slut, but she was a two-pair-a-dirty-underwear slut, he said.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:47.920
    | text      = There were murmurs of amen from the pews.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:50.579
    | text      = In the third row, a toddler in a three-piece suit played with the rings on his grandmother's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:54.420
    | text      = fingers, which she held behind her back as she solemnly bowed her head listening.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:58.579
    | text      = All right, journalists, that's a little bit of a flourish you didn't need.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:01.260
    | text      = Well, we're going to get to why I am continuing to read this article, because it's, you know,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:07.659
    | text      = we'll get to something that is cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:09.899
    | text      = So wait, this is recent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:11.619
    | text      = This is 2016.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:12.619
    | text      = Oh, this is 2016?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:13.619
    | text      = Yeah, this is a year ago.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:14.979
    | text      = So his church has already been shut down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:17.260
    | text      = I think it might have been.

    | timestamp = 01:29:18.619
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:19.619
    | text      = I'm not entirely sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:20.619
    | text      = I should, you know what, I should have looked that up, and I will in a second, but the reason
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:26.619
    | text      = that I want to get through this or get down to it is in a spectacular piece of fun, one
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:37.939
    | text      = of the groups that was trying to buy the property is the Ali Forney Center, which is the one
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:45.340
    | text      = that we support.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:46.340
    | text      = It's the homeless LGBTQ charity and housing organization that we have donated to in the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:53.779
    | text      = past and we encourage people to donate to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:56.300
    | text      = The Ali Forney Center, which serves homeless LGBT youth, has raised at least $200,000 towards
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:01.520
    | text      = the purchase of Outlaw Church.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:03.699
    | text      = Rivers of Living Water, an LGBT spiritual group nearby in Harlem, has raised significantly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:08.260
    | text      = less money for the effort.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:10.060
    | text      = The Ali Forney Center is a critical organization of an estimated 1.6 million kids who experience
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:14.979
    | text      = homelessness each year.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:16.380
    | text      = Forty percent are lesbian, gay, bisexual or transgender, according to the Williams Institute,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:20.539
    | text      = a sex and gender research group at the University of California, Los Angeles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:24.539
    | text      = One survey of homeless LGBT youth in New York found that about half were black.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:28.399
    | text      = The most common reason they gave for being homeless is rejection by their family, the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:31.739
    | text      = Williams Institute found.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:33.220
    | text      = They are more likely to drop out of school due to harassment and bullying, facing poverty
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:37.180
    | text      = and unemployment challenges, many of them turned to sex work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:40.260
    | text      = They're victims of disproportionate violence too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:43.140
    | text      = In 1997, the Ali Forney Center's nickname, namesake, excuse me, a gender non-conforming
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:48.140
    | text      = teen who had moved to the city's shelter system was shot in the head in Harlem, just 12 blocks
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:52.420
    | text      = away from Outlaw.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:54.039
    | text      = Before he was murdered, Forney would sometimes sleep on the hill in Marcus Garvey Park, just
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:58.560
    | text      = at the end of Outlaw's block.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:00.399
    | text      = He was known for agitating for police investigations into the deaths of his queer friends.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:09.439
    | text      = All 200 homeless gay and transgender youth are on the waiting list for a bed every night,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:13.380
    | text      = the group says.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:14.460
    | text      = Covenant Group, another New York organization that caters to homeless youth, has to turn
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:18.300
    | text      = away 70 to 80 young people every month due to lack of capacity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:22.619
    | text      = Taking over the Outlaw Church would allow Ali Forney Center to put a roof over more
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:26.119
